results.name: Mission Mermaiden ~Hasumi and the Deep Sea Sisters~
The Cruel King and the Great Hero
Mama to Boku no Karada no Shikumi Okaa-san ni Chitsunai Shasei Shitara Oyakoukou na Sekai

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit / Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHz / AMD A12-9800, 3.80 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti, 2 GB / AMD Radeon HD 7770, 2 GB / Intel Iris Plus
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Estimated performance: 1080p/60fps with graphics settings at "Low". Framerate might drop in graphics-intensive scenes. - 64-bit processor and operating system are required.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit / Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300, 2.80 GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R9 270X / Intel Arc A380
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Estimated performance: 1080p/60fps with graphics settings at "High". Framerate might drop in graphics-intensive scenes. - 64-bit processor and operating system are required. - Windows 10 (Version 1809 or later) and a 4GB VRAM GPU (graphics board or video card) are required for DirectX 12 API.
